title: Himi 292
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.11.
1.
Ke tau hiva kia Sīsū,
Mo fa’a fakafeta’i,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa lahi,
Ki hotau laumālie,
Haleluia! Kia Sīsū Kalaisi.
2.
Na’e kītaki ‘e ia,
‘A e mamahi lahi,
Ko e totongi totonu,
Pea mā’oni’oni,
Ko e hifo,’oku ma’ongo’onga.
3.
Sīsū ke ke fakafo’ou,
‘A ho’o ngāue lelei,
‘I he loto ‘o ho kakai,
‘Aki ho Laumālie,
Ke mau tui, Pea fa’a fakafeta’i,
4.
Ke mau hoko ‘i he tui,
Ko e fānau ohia,
‘A e ‘Afiona ‘Eiki,
Pea mau tonuhia,
‘I he tui, kia Sīsū Kalaisi. *
